name: Fair Trade Christmas Cards (30 Pack)
description:
These hand made Christmas greeting cards are creations by artists in Rwanda, out of dried banana leaves. There are no two cards the same, and no assortment containing the exact same cards. The cards are 5.5" by 4." This bulk pack contains 30 greeting cards and envelopes. Each card is purchased at fair trade values and every note you write inside helps create jobs for a village of widows in Africa. The inside is purposefully blank for you to personally customize.

BUY A 30 PACK AND SAVE $10!
Retail Price: $60
SALE Price: $50

Buy Cards. Help Widows.

name: Satchel Blue
description:
A simple over the shoulder bag for the city made with 100% reclaimed materials. Featuring a fiber lining, inside pocket, Velcro closures, front and back pockets, and shoulder strap.

Size:  8 x 7.5 x 2.5 inches 

This plywood good is made with reclaimed & recycled billboard materials by Guatemalan urban artists. A percentage of profits will enable the creation of new homes for Mayan widows.

Thanks for joining our more-than-profit collective.

name: Wallet Blue
description:
A one of a kind creation, no two wallets are the same. Each one-fold creation features cash dividers and two credit card slots for a light & sleek modern design.

Size: 4.5 x 3.25 inches.

This plywood good is made with reclaimed & recycled billboard materials by Guatemalan urban artists. A percentage of profits will enable the creation of new homes for Mayan widows.


Retail Price: $14
SALE PRICE: $10
